tool_description: Analyzes freeze frame data captured when diagnostic trouble codes were set to understand failure conditions and root causes.

dtc_code.description: Specific diagnostic code to analyze freeze frame data for

engine_rpm.description: Engine RPM when code was set

coolant_temp.description: Engine coolant temperature when code set (Fahrenheit)

throttle_position.description: Throttle position percentage when failure occurred

intake_pressure.description: Manifold absolute pressure when code set

error_messages: Invalid DTC format: Diagnostic code must follow standard OBD format.
Unrealistic parameter values: Engine parameters must be within normal operating ranges.
Insufficient freeze frame data: Required parameters missing for meaningful analysis.
Parameter correlation error: Freeze frame values indicate inconsistent operating conditions.
usage: Provide DTC code and all available freeze frame parameters captured when the code was set. Tool analyzes operating conditions to identify failure causes.

failure_analysis.description: Analysis of what conditions led to the diagnostic code

parameter_anomalies.description: Operating parameters that were outside normal ranges

probable_cause.description: Most likely root cause based on freeze frame data

diagnostic_clues.description: Additional diagnostic insights from parameter analysis
